page.title: 03Carless Exploration For Oil
page.content: Following Vibroseis Seismic Survey showing geological structures capable of containing hydrocarbons the topsoil was removedfrom the 1.4 hectare site and the area made level.A layer of heavy duty polythene was layed followed by hard core(500 lorry loads) and asphelt. The site was surrounded by a moat to hold ang possible spillage An access road has been built The firm will drill to the depth of 5000-6000 ft and drilling will continue for about three weeks 24 hours a day. If the well is dry the site will be retured to it's oringinal state (all stone,asphelt removed)If oil is found,a"nodding donkey"pump will be used. The site can not be seen from any house.
